# Government Tender Announcement
## Elder Helper Services, Ontario Region
### Contract Reference Number: cb-740-51273945

As part of the Government of Canada's efforts to provide culturally sensitive and responsive services to Indigenous offenders, Correctional Services Canada (CSC) is soliciting advance contract award notice for Elder Helper Services in the Ontario Region.

### Contract Brief
The CSC requires the services of an Elder Helper to assist in providing Indigenous social services to offenders within federal institutions in the Ontario Region. The successful contractor will provide support services to Elder Helpers and facilitate Indigenous programming, ensuring the accommodation of Indigenous spiritual and cultural practices.

### Responsibilities
The contractor will be responsible for:

* Providing Elder Helper services to support the work of Elders and the interdisciplinary team
* Assisting offenders in accessing traditional healing and contemporary treatment interventions
* Conducting group discussions and teachings on ceremonial objects and cultural practices
* Providing counseling services to offenders as directed
* Supporting staff in preparing reports and providing technical support for case management and parole processes
* Participating in staff meetings to enhance team concept and create a healthy support network

### Contract Requirements
The contract is for a six-month period, commencing October 30, 2023, with an option to extend for an additional seven-month period. The estimated contract value is $81,108.53 (GST/HST extra).

### Opportunities for Small, Medium Enterprises (SMEs)
This contract is set aside for Indigenous Suppliers, Providing Opportunities for Small, Medium Enterprises (SMEs) to participate and bid.

### Instructions for Bidders
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the goods, services, or construction services described in this ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to the contact person identified in this notice on or before the closing date and time of this notice.

### Closing Date and Time
The closing date and time for accepting statements of capabilities is October 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM ET.

### Point of Contact
For inquiries and statement of capabilities, please contact:

Danielle Murdoch, Regional Contract Administrator
Correctional Service Canada, Ontario Region
P.O Box 1174, 445 Union Street West
Kingston, Ontario K7L 4Y8
Telephone: 343-422-4831
Facsimile: 613-536-4571
Email: danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca
